name: jinhaiware
description:
Controls:

  • Select/Move: up/down/left/right or W/A/S/D
  • Select/Interact: SPACE or ENTER

In 2022, I decided to learn game design from scratch using the Godot game engine by forcing myself to make several short games throughout the year (regardless if they were any good or not). I learned a lot! So I decided to stitch them all together in a Warioware-type game before putting them away. Don't expect much, I'm still a beginner game dev!! But it was a lot of fun to make!
